content: In the Harry Potter series, what magical object is used to transport wizards from one location to another by touching it?

In the Harry Potter series, the magical object used to transport wizards from one location to another by touching it is called a "Portkey." A Portkey can be any ordinary object that has been magically enchanted to transport anyone who touches it to a pre-designated location when it is activated. Portkeys are often used for transportation in the wizarding world, especially for long distances or when other means of transportation are not convenient.
